data.description: Welcome to Monke Tag, a Gorilla Tag fan game with Tag! There are 3 Game modes, Infection, Casual and Minigames. There are 8 maps to explore, Forest, ZeroGravity, Pool, Beach, Mines, Caves, Mountains and Jungle. here are tons of cool cosmetics that you can buy in shop and wear anywhere! There is a myth in mines, that the miners that mine for coal say to Monkes who stumble into mines. They tell them that they have seen a disfigured Monke roaming around but that's just a myth. There are tons of cool cosmetics that you can buy in shop and wear anywhere!

changelog.change_log:
**Valentines Update (BIG UPDATE)! 3.3**

**--ADDED--**
- Made it evening time
- Added more ambience around the maps
- Added Valentine cosmetics
- Added a sign for faces in the mall
- Added a second monster to horror and changed the first one
- Added a small city on the other side of the mall window
- Added the first stage of construction of the PBPD (Peanut Butter Police Department)
- All lights are back on
- (Infection next update)
- Finished stage 1 of the Density Point (Reactor)



**--REMOVED/FIXED--**
- Removed snow
- Fixed construction hat causing lag

**Bug Fix Update 2.9.1!**

**--REMOVED/FIXED--**
- Added a Claim button after buying Mod Menu's

Content Update 2.9! (Again)

--ADDED--
- IAP is now ingame
- Fixed ATM (Thx to Bmix)
- Fixed Golden Bundle
- Fixed Mod Menu's
- Ziplines

--REMOVED/FIXED--
- Lil bugs and glitches
- Removed Room Codes from leaderboards

Content Update 2.9!

--ADDED--
- IAP is now ingame
- The ATM now works
- There is a Golden Bundle
- Mod Menu's
- Ziplines

--REMOVED/FIXED--
- Lil bugs and glitches
- Removed Room Codes from leaderboards

**Bug fix update 2.8!**

**--REMOVED/FIXED--**
- Fixed Tag being broken (Thx to Joshh)
- Fixed Page 3 of Faces not being there on the wardrobe
- Fixed other lil things

Performance Update! 2.6.2

--Patchnotes--
- Made all mirros/camera disable 
when not near them
- Fixed alot of performance issues in forest (Still frame
drops when look across the entire forest
